meanings.definition: A type of filled dumpling originating from Eastern Europe.
meanings.sent1: My grandma makes delicious pierogies with potato and cheese filling.
meanings.sent2: We ordered pierogies at the Polish restaurant for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The pierogies danced in the boiling water, ready to be eaten.
meanings.sent4: The pierogies were like little flavor-packed pillows on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked pierogies filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: She brought a tray of pierogies to the potluck.
meanings.sent2: The family enjoyed a feast of pierogies during the holiday.
meanings.sent3: The pierogies in the basket looked like a tasty mountain of treats.
meanings.sent4: The pierogies on the table were disappearing quickly.
meanings.sent5: The pierogies were the stars of the dinner party.
